languages.text: {n}Вы видите, что облик К'тан покрывают все новые прорехи — Ярмо пожинает Его силы, и удержание физической структуры дается Ему все тяжелее. Каждое нарушение, что вы вносите в него, приближает звездного хищника к плену.{/n}

{n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы видите, что облик К'тан покрывают все новые прорехи — Ярмо пожинает Его силы, и удержание физической структуры дается Ему все тяжелее. Каждое нарушение, что вы вносите в него, приближает звездного хищника к плену.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can see the C'Tan's figure getting more and more holes — the Yoke is soaking up His power, and it is getting harder for Him to maintain his physical structure. Every disturbance you make brings the star predator closer to the imprisonment.{/n}

{n}You can see the C'Tan's figure getting more and more holes — the Yoke is soaking up His power, and it is getting harder for Him to maintain his physical structure. Every disturbance you make brings the star predator closer to the imprisonment.{/n}

{n}You can see the C'Tan's figure getting more and more holes—the Yoke is soaking up His power and it is getting increasingly harder for Him to maintain his physical structure. Every disturbance you create inches the star predator closer to the imprisonment.{/n}

{n}You can see the C'Tan's figure getting more and more holes—the Yoke is soaking up His power and it is getting increasingly harder for Him to maintain his physical structure. Every disturbance you create inches the star predator closer to the imprisonment.{/n}

{n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}

{n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous voyez de plus en plus de déchirures apparaître sur le corps de l'Écharde. À mesure que le Joug absorbe son pouvoir, il lui est de plus en plus difficile de maintenir sa structure physique. Chaque imperfection que vous créez rapproche le prédateur stellaire de l'emprisonnement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous voyez de plus en plus de déchirures apparaître sur le corps de l'Écharde. À mesure que le Joug absorbe son pouvoir, il lui est de plus en plus difficile de maintenir sa structure physique. Chaque imperfection que vous créez rapproche le prédateur stellaire de l'emprisonnement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Puedes ver que la figura del fragmento tiene cada vez más agujeros: el Yugo está absorbiendo Su poder y le resulta más difícil conservar Su estructura física con cada momento que pasa. Las imperfecciones que creas empujan al devorador de estrellas hacia su prisión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes ver que la figura del C'Tan tiene cada vez más agujeros: el Yugo está absorbiendo Su poder y le resulta más difícil conservar Su estructura física con cada momento que pasa. Las perturbaciones que creas empujan paso a paso al devorador de estrellas hacia su prisión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}星神碎片身上的空洞越来越多。圣枷正在不断吸收祂的力量，祂越来越难以维持原本的身体结构。你制造的每一次干扰，都让这个以群星为食的掠食者离牢笼更近一步。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你看到，星神身体上的空洞越来越多。圣枷正在不断吸收祂的力量，祂越来越难以维持原本的身体结构。你制造的每一次干扰，都让这个以群星为食的掠食者离牢笼更近一步。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auf dem Fragment erscheinen mehr und mehr Tränen. Während das Joch seine Macht absorbiert, wird es für das Fragment immer schwieriger, seine körperliche Struktur zu wahren. Jede Unzulänglichkeit, die du ihm zufügst, bringt den Sternenräuber der Gefangenschaft näher.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst, wie die Gestalt des C'tan mehr und mehr Löcher bekommt. Das Joch saugt seine Kraft auf, und es fällt ihm immer schwerer, seine physische Gestalt beizubehalten. Jede Störung, die du erzeugst, drängt den Sternenräuber ein kleines Stück weiter in Richtung Gefangenschaft.{/n}

languages.text: {n}シャードの姿全体に、多くの裂け目が現れていく。ヨークがその力を吸収し、その物理的構造を維持することが困難になっているのだ。あなたがそれに不完全さをもたらすほどに、星の捕食者は囚われていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}シャードの姿全体に、多くの裂け目が現れていく。ヨークがその力を吸収し、その物理的構造を維持することが困難になっているのだ。あなたがそれに不完全さをもたらすほどに、星の捕食者は囚われていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parça'nın biçimi gitgide bozuluyor. Boyunduruk onun gücünü emdikçe Parça'nın fiziksel yapısını koruması zorlaşıyor. Oluşturduğun her kusur, yıldız yırtıcısını esarete yakınlaştırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}More and more tears appear all over the Shard's form. As the Yoke absorbs Its power, it becomes increasingly harder for the Shard to maintain Its physical structure. Each imperfection you inflict brings the star predator closer to imprisonment.{/n}
